description.value:
A shaman who selects the wind spirit appears windswept, and her movements seem lithe and carefree.

Spirit Magic Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nkd3xocluvt1rovu]{Alter Winds} (1st),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cnuin981hdq7ryit]{Gust Of Wind} (2nd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fe8jy0h1l3su2322]{Cloak of Winds} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.4gxx3bodf76e63en]{River of Wind} (4th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.g9koefk7x9szoheo]{Control Winds} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nk37t5em8q4v1djs]{Sirocco} (6th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.578t0lra5ll3aifs]{Control Weather} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.i9greyz3c0ap32vi]{Whirlwind} (8th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lun2gymejsmkjg4g]{Winds of Vengeance} (9th)

Spirit Animal: The shamanâ€™s spirit animal crackles with electrical energy when it moves, giving off light like a candle. This electricity deals no damage to the animal or any creature that touches the animal. The animal gains electricity resistance 10.
